participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: enthusiastic and determined, with a love for summer and a clear goal of becoming a doctor.
participant_1.background: I just graduated high school. I am headed to university of michigan in the fall. I want to be a doctor when I graduate. I love tacos but hate spaghetti. My favorite season is summer.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: thoughtful and creative, navigating the challenges of high school and friendships with a passion for art.
participant_2.background: My best friend just moved away. I start my senior year of high school next week. I went to japan this summer. My mom is a painter. My favorite sport is hockey.

content.text: Hi! I'm participant_1.
Hi! I'm participant_2.
What are you up to?
Not much. Just hanging out at home. How about you?
I'm just getting ready to go to the beach.
Nice! I love the beach. I wish I could go with you.
You should! It's a great day for it.
I'm not sure if I can. I have to go to work in a few hours.
Oh, that's too bad. Maybe next time.
Yeah, maybe.
So, what are you going to do for your senior year of high school?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking about going to college, but I'm not sure where I want to go yet.
I'm going to the University of Michigan in the fall. I'm going to be a pre-med major.
That's cool! I've always wanted to be a doctor.
It's a lot of work, but it's worth it.
I know. I'm sure you'll do great.
Thanks! I hope so.
So, what are you going to do after college?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking about going to medical school, but I'm not sure.
Well, whatever you do, I'm sure you'll be great at it.
Thanks! I hope so.
